mapper.select: select q.pno, q.mno, q.sno, q.title, q.secret, q.rpl_content, q.rpl_dttm, p.content, p.wdttm, p.view_cnt, p.pstat, m.profile_pic, m.name, m.nickname, f.fno, f.fname, s.sname, s.sstat, r.srpl_fno, r.srpl_fname from har_sqna q inner join har_member m on m.mno=q.mno inner join har_post p on p.pno=q.pno left join har_file f on f.pno=p.pno inner join har_service s on s.sno=q.sno left join har_srpl_file r on r.pno=q.pno where p.pstat=1 order by q.pno

select q.pno, q.mno, q.sno, q.title, q.secret, q.rpl_content, q.rpl_dttm, p.content, p.wdttm, p.view_cnt, p.pstat, m.profile_pic, m.name, m.nickname, f.fno, f.fname, s.sname, s.sstat from har_sqna q inner join har_member m on m.mno=q.mno inner join har_post p on p.pno=q.pno left join har_file f on f.pno=p.pno inner join har_service s on s.sno=q.sno where q.pno = #{no} and p.pstat=1 order by q.pno
